home.text: Hi! I'm Silvina. I love creating responsive web apps using React and Node.

about.bio: I'm passionate about crafting scalable and accessible web applications that tackle real-world challenges. My strength lies in navigating complexities and solving problems, and coding has become the perfect outlet for utilizing these skills. Beyond coding, I love delving into new disciplines; my most recent pursuits are archery and sailing.
about.extra: Let's connect and explore how my skills can contribute to your project's success.

skills.text: Here's a list of technologies I've worked with

work.text: Check out some of my most recent work

contact.text: If you are interested in knowing more about me or my work, send me a message
contact.successMessage: Thanks! I will get back to you soon.
